metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8883 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
The jpc_dec_tiledecode function in jpc_dec.c in JasPer before 1.900.8 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8883` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.2
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> reproducer available in bug report

criterions.comment: jasper package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.2').
